entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 7.
